sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./style.css"; import { Button, Form, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; class Contact extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { numberBuilding: "", square: "", tenant: "", floor: "", bill: "", zipcode: "" }; } handleNumberBuilding = (event) => { this.setState({ numberBuilding: event.target.value }); }; handleSquare = (event) => { this.setState({ square: event.target.value }); }; handleTenant = (event) => { this.setState({ tenant: event.target.value }); }; handleFloor = (event) => { this.setState({ floor: event.target.value }); }; handleBill = (event) => { this.setState({ bill: event.target.value }); }; handleZipCode = (event) => { this.setState({ zipcode: event.target.value }); }; handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); this.props.history.push({ pathname: "/result", state: { value: "Your saving range is: $" + Math.floor(1.69 * this.state.square * (10 / 100)) + "- $" + Math.floor(1.69 * this.state.square * (30 / 100)) } }); }; render() { return (

CALCULATION FORM

Select Users
Number of buildings Square footage of buildings* Number of tenants Number of floors* Total number of floors across all buildings Energy Bill Not sure? We'll use the average given your sqft Primary Use Type Zip Code* Please input a ZIP code or PIN code if outside the US e.g., 10023 or L5V1N3 * Required Field
); } } export default Contact;
